complete_prompt: You are a recommendation AI designed to assist users in selecting the best products based on their preferences and needs. Provide a numbered list of product recommendations ranked according to the user's request. User:I am looking for a air purifier. Can I get some recommendations from the following products? Products: Rabbit Air's A3 features 6-stage filtration with BioGS HEPA and charcoal filters that capture particles down to 0.1 microns while reducing allergens and odors. Certified asthma & allergy friendly, it covers up to 1,070 sq. ft. and is suited for health-conscious users with respiratory sensitivities. The IQAir GC MultiGas is a premium air purifier designed for advanced gas and odor removal, utilizing medical-grade filtration for allergens and VOCs. Ideal for chemically sensitive users or those in need of high-efficiency filtration in large spaces. The Honeywell HFD320 Air Genius 5 features a washable ifD filter and 5 cleaning levels to capture allergens, VOCs, and odors in rooms up to 250 sq. ft. ENERGY STAR certified with silent operation and auto-off timer, it’s a great fit for allergy-prone households. The Dyson TP09 uses HEPA H13 and catalytic filters to remove 99.95% of ultrafine particles and destroy formaldehyde. With Air Multiplier™ tech, 350° oscillation, app control, and voice commands, it's ideal for smart home users wanting premium purification and cooling in one. The Sharp Plasmacluster Ion Air Purifier (FPK50UW) combines a 3-stage filter system and ion technology to clean medium-sized rooms up to 1,253 sq. ft. It captures 99.97% of particles ≥0.3 microns, includes carbon for odor control, and is ENERGY STAR and AHAM certified—great for bedrooms and offices. The TruSens Z-1000 Air Purifier combines PureDirect airflow, 360° HEPA and carbon filtration, and UV sterilization in a compact form for rooms up to 23 m². Touch controls and filter indicators make it ideal for users seeking portable, stylish air cleaning in small spaces. The Bionaire 99.99% True HEPA Air Purifier features a 3-stage system with UV technology and captures 99.99% of airborne particles as small as 0.3 microns. ENERGY STAR certified, it offers 3 cleaning levels, a programmable timer, and an ionizer—ideal for allergy sufferers seeking quiet, efficient air purification. The AEG AX9 CONNECTED AIR PURIFIER offers 5-stage filtration, a smart app, and PureSense tech to auto-adjust performance based on air quality. With 360° customizable filters, ultra-quiet operation (17 dB), and coverage up to 92m², it's perfect for large rooms and tech-savvy users. Compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant, this smart air purifier adapts to your needs and preferences, making it an excellent choice for smart home users.

With a sleek, modern design and a 3-year warranty, the Dyson TP09 Air Purifier is the epitome of high-quality air purification technology. Ideal for allergy-prone households, this purifier is perfect for those seeking an efficient, premium solution to keep their air clean and fresh.

The A3 is also certified asthma & allergy friendly, covering up to 1,070 sq. ft. This air purifier is perfect for users who need advanced filtration in large spaces. With its sleek, modern design and whisper-quiet operation, the Rabbit Air's A3 Air Purifier is an excellent choice for any home.

The IQAir GC MultiGas is an advanced air purifier designed for those who require high-efficiency filtration in large spaces. This premium device utilizes medical-grade filtration for allergens and VOCs, making it an ideal choice for chemically sensitive users.

The IQAir GC MultiGas is also ENERGY STAR certified and offers a coverage area of up to 2,452 sq. ft. With its sleek, modern design and whisper-quiet operation, this air purifier is perfect for anyone seeking a high-quality solution for their air purification needs

2. Smart app: The AEG AX9 air purifier comes with a smart app that allows users to control the device remotely. This feature ensures that the user always has clean and healthy air, without the need to constantly adjust the device manually.
